Posts.Content: Feb 21, 2009 01:52PM - edited Feb 21, 2009 01:53PM by Lee18 One question: Did you have the Multisite 3 testing for the "founders genes" affecting Ashkenazic Jews or the comprehensive (more expensive) BRAC Analysis.  I had the former and then saw the footnote from the company saying that there was also a more comprehensive test which could show up mutations related to cancer.  I called Myriad and they said that the insurance company had approved the full test. (I had several family members with  breast cancer as well as my own).  For whatever reasons, my oncologist had only ordered the founders test, but when I asked him to, he ordered the full test.
